duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage infrastructure, application, and architecture strategy for the company.
Analyze application performance metrics and propose optimizations.
Work with cross-functional teams to empower content creation and integration with moving partner CRMs.
Review pull requests and propose architectural and technical solutions.
Write elegant and readable code with reasonable test coverage.
Provide technical solutions and estimates in layman terms and work well with non-technical team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or relevant field (or equivalent experience)
